# addAnnotations(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an array of annotation objects to the map view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addAnnotations(_ annotations: [any MKAnnotation])
```

## Parameters

- **annotations**: An array of annotation objects. Each object in the array must conform to the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKAnnotation] protocol. The map view retains the individual annotation objects.

## Annotating the map

- **annotations**: The annotations associated with the map view.
- **addAnnotation(_:)**: Adds the specified annotation to the map view.
- **removeAnnotation(_:)**: Removes the specified annotation object from the map view.
- **removeAnnotations(_:)**: Removes an array of annotation objects from the map view.
- **annotations(in:)**: Returns the annotation objects within the specified map rectangle.
